description: Gets all batch prediction jobs or a specific job if you specify a job ID. This is a paginated API. If you provide a null maxResults, this action retrieves a maximum of 50 records per page. If you provide a maxResults, the value must be between 1 and 50. To get the next page results, provide the pagination token from the GetBatchPredictionJobsResponse as part of your request. A null pagination token fetches the records from the beginning.

nested_items.name: batchPredictions
nested_items.description: An array containing the details of each batch prediction job.

nested_items.name: jobId
nested_items.description: The job ID for the batch prediction.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: The reason a batch prediction job failed.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: Timestamp of when the batch prediction job started.

nested_items.name: completionTime
nested_items.description: Timestamp of when the batch prediction job completed.

nested_items.name: lastHeartbeatTime
nested_items.description: Timestamp of most recent heartbeat indicating the batch prediction job was making progress.

nested_items.name: inputPath
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 location of your training file.

nested_items.name: outputPath
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 location of your output file.

nested_items.name: eventTypeName
nested_items.description: The name of the event type.

nested_items.name: iamRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role to use for this job request.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of batch prediction job.

nested_items.name: processedRecordsCount
nested_items.description: The number of records processed by the batch prediction job.

nested_items.name: totalRecordsCount
nested_items.description: The total number of records in the batch prediction job.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The next token for the subsequent request.
